revdescription.para: Created document by revising and reorganizing reference and conceptual content from an ingestion specification document, instructional content from administrator documentation, and the data model reference content from developer documentation.
Enhanced content by providing hints for how to address errors and warnings reported in ingestion log files.
Enchanced parser warning and error content with examples and the assertion that each parser errors results in an ingestion failure.
Removed material some content that was no longer accurate since out of order ingestion is now fully supported.
Updated references to reflect changes in AssessmentPeriodDescriptor and AssessmentFamily.
Added a chapter covering deleting data through the ingestion system. For this release, the feature is implemented with "safe deletion" limitations described in the new chapter.
Repaired text wrapping and overlapping issues in reference tables throughout the document.
Supplemented and revised the chapter covering deleting data through the ingestion system.
Appended new entries to the table of ingestion error messages, all related to the new deletes through ingestion feature.
Updated reference and conceptual content based on careful review from engineers.
For the deletes through ingestion content:

listitem.para: Added new information about how student data is handled during the force delete of an education organization.
Removed entity-specific constraints on forced deletes since they're no longer applicable.

revdescription.para: No changes were made to this document for this release.
Updated table to reflect deprecated error code CORE_0015.
No changes were made to this document for this release.
Updated error message table and description of the control file format to reflect that the use of a checksum for each XML file was deprecated.
No changes were made to this document for this release.
No changes were made to this document for this release.

Changes made to reflect move from SEA, LEA and School entity subtypes to one Generic EducationOrganization Type. Additionally, documentation of support for multiple parent ed org references has been added.
Change made to reflect the addition of AttendanceEventCategory to the natural key of AttendanceEvent.
Added the control file flag @duplicate-detection and options.
Updated Interchange name in Appendix.
Added information regarding BellSchedule and ClassPeriod entities.
Removed cascade delete as an option.
